titleStmt.title: An appendix of the saints lately canonized, and beatifyed by Paule the fift, and Gregorie the Fifteenth
titleStmt.author: Kinsman, Edward.
Villegas, Alonso de, b. 1534. Flos sanctorum.

notesStmt.note: Of unknown authorship; originally published as an appendix to: Villegas, Alonso de. Flos sanctorum.
Translated by Edward Kinsman, whose name appears on A2r.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
